title: Pool Party Fiora Waist Deep on Fountain and Feet deep on rift

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: Dunno how it happened.. but it did..

replies.body: O...kay. Well, that's interesting, haha. This isn't something I'm able to repro on my end. Are you able to get this to occur multiple times, or was this a one time deal?

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=bbBc2hEh,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-03-01T18:10:51.583+0000)
>
> O...kay. Well, that's interesting, haha. This isn't something I'm able to repro on my end. Are you able to get this to occur multiple times, or was this a one time deal?

Another thing to note the champion is only a certain depth under.. so on the different elevations of the map (the fountain shes deeper,on the actual rift shes shallower.. Seems if i go into the river it fixes itself..
Ah yeah, that'd made sense based on how the terrain's built out! I'm still digging into this, but I'm unsuccessful in figuring out what's causing it.
If going into the River fixes it, maybe it's related to using mobility spells from the River into higher elevated terrain.
I had a similar bug with a totally different champion. Although I honestly can't remember who it was. It wasn't flora though so it isn't just her. Sorry I can't help you repro.
It's all good - even having knowledge that it's occurring to more than one person helps because it likely means it isn't due to someone's personal computer/settings.
Yes I've seen this happen with other champions in the past.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=bbBc2hEh,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-03-01T18:10:51.583+0000)
>
> O...kay. Well, that's interesting, haha. This isn't something I'm able to repro on my end. Are you able to get this to occur multiple times, or was this a one time deal?

Sorry Katey.. yes has happened multiple times .. Not sure what triggers it though.

Looks to me like a teaser for the summer Summoners Rift.

The whole rift will be a big pool, and So character models will be partially sunk in.

They are merely testing the code for sinking the characters slightly. 
Mark my words.

I've seen this happen on multiple pro streams with different champions.
Not sure what the cause is.

Edit: I _think_ it started after the patch where they made adjustments to how particles that overlap terrain are displayed, so that the abilities wouldn't cut off at map intersections.
